text: Our food(pizza, bread sticks, wings) is always hot and fresh and delicious. One of the best Pizza Hut locations I know of.

text: Thank you for the amazing pizza and wings we just got delivered. The food was so delicious, fresh, and hot when we received it... I'm extremely pleased! (and so is my family).   Y'all knocked it out the park with this one! Will definitely order from this pizza hut again. Thank you!

Best Pizza Hut in Alexandria! Got a pizza yesterday and the stuff crust was messed up. Called and they made me a free pizza for the trouble. Aaron the Manager is a top notch guy.
